name: Little Army
description:
"The Little Army" is a game where only the strongest survive and advance!
Choose your Tyrant and crush your enemies! No one should survive your fury!

"Give me enough medals, and I'll win every war!"


Choose your favorite among 6 Tyrants and build your personal army.
Each Tyrant masters a faction with specific abilities,
feed your fury to unleash the Tyrant's wrath upon your opponents.
Use all the abilities at your disposal to overwhelm your enemies!



"Do you know the height of your enemy, you know how high you will have to jump."
-King Gross



"Whoever argues that you can attack from below, doesn't know how big you have to be."
-King Big



“The bigger they are, the louder they fall.”
-Queen Ant



“You can't bring down an army if it's flying.”
-Queen Bee



Rely on quality? Why, when you can have quantity?”
-King Mos



“An enemy must be blocked and eaten. The more there are, the better!”
-Queen Web
